product_name: Delta Cycle Smartphone Caddy II - White
long_description: The white Delta Cycle Smartphone Caddy II offers a wide platform to fit larger smartphones and cases for easy access and viewing when you're riding, and it includes an all-weather water-resistant bag.
short_description: The white Delta Cycle Smartphone Caddy II offers a wide platform to fit larger smartphones and cases for easy access and viewing when you're riding, and it includes an all-weather water-resistant bag.
